snippet.title: The Westport Independent - Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Website: http://www.doublezeroonezero.com/
Twitter: @0010_Games
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/the-westport-independent
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/thewestportindependent?fref=ts

The Westport Independent is a censorship simulator about the last weeks on an independent newspaper which is to be dismantled according to a new government bill. 

You play an editor in charge of choosing what will be printed in the paper, making sure that the content is nice and proper according to the government guidelines. With rebellions against the government rising slowly amongst the public, whose thruth will you print?
